channel.title: Compassion International Audio Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Compassion International
channel.description: Hear some of your favorite Compassion personalities, speakers, music artists and advocates share their life-changing experiences. These experiences are a direct result of their connection to Compassion's ministry to children in poverty around the world. Stay tuned after this podcast to hear how you can create your own Compassion experience through our child sponsorship ministry.
channel.copyright: Copyright © Compassion International (1995-2007). All Rights Reserved.

image.title: Compassion International – Christian Child Sponsorship Audio Podcast

channel.itunes:summary: Hear some of your favorite Compassion personalities, speakers, music artists and advocates share their life-changing experiences. These experiences are a direct result of their connection to Compassion's ministry to children in poverty around the world. Stay tuned after this podcast to hear how you can create your own Compassion experience through our child sponsorship ministry.

item.title: Tony Campolo
item.description: Epsisode 1: Tony Campolo: inspirational, speaker, author and teacher
item.itunes:summary: Listen as Tony Campolo shares his heart for poor children and his hope for a generation ready to change the world.

item.title: John and Stasi Eldredge
item.description: Episode 2: Accomplished Christian authors and speakers, John and Stasi Eldredge
item.itunes:summary: Part 1 of 3 – Listen as they share their experience about a trip to visit Compassion’s work in Guatemala.

item.title: Stasi Eldredge
item.description: Episode 3: Accomplished Christian authors and speakers, John and Stasi Eldredge
item.itunes:summary: Part 2 of 3 – Listen as Stasi shares about her trip to visit Compassion’s work in Guatemala.

item.title: John Eldredge
item.description: Episode 4: Accomplished Christian authors and speakers, John and Stasi Eldredge
item.itunes:summary: Part 3 of 3 – Listen as John shares about his trip to visit Compassion’s work in Guatemala.

item.title: Wess Stafford
item.description: Epsisode : Wess Stafford: President of Compassion International
item.itunes:summary: Listen as Wess Stafford speaks about comforting the afflicted and afflicting the comforted.
